optionalfeature.name: Overwhelming Fighting Style
entries: Your weapon attacks with the heavy property score a critical hit on a roll of 19-20.

subclassFeature.name: Dragon Slayer
entries: Slaying dragons is not a easy job. Those how success in such a task are extordinary peoples of great strength. Rewards for slaying one are hords of gold and fame, but for a Slayer it means more power.

subclassFeature.name: Power Harvest
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you gain a Dragon Slayer Rank equal to 1.
You may absorb the power of a fallen dragon with CR equal or grater than your Dragon Slayer rank and increase it by 1.

subclassFeature.name: Draconic Prowess
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you gain the ability to reinforce your body with the power of foes you slay. As a bonus action you can gain 5 additional temporary hit points for each Dragon Slayer Rank, with last 1 minute.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Dragonsbane
entries: Starting at 7th level, the first melee weapon attacks agains a dragon is a critical hit.

subclassFeature.name: Powerful Presence
entries: Whenever you make a Charisma (Intimidation) or Charisma (Performance) check, you gain a bonus to the check equal to your Strength modifier.

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Challenge
entries: Starting at 7th level, as an action, you exert an aura of your presence for the duration of 1 minute. Each enemy within 5 feet for each dragon you have slayed from you gains the following effects:
- Suffer disadvantages on attack rolls agains other creatures than you.
- Losse the ability to fly, landing immediately.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Merciless
entries: Staring at 15th level, whenever you hit a creature with a weapon attack, the creature takes an extra 1d6 of the weapon type damage if the target is missing any of its hit points.

subclassFeature.name: Whirlwind
entries: You can use your action to make a melee attack against any number of creatures within you melee attack range, with a separate attack roll for each target.

subclassFeature.name: Draconic Awakening
entries: You unleash the overwhelming power you gather through merciless hunting, partly becoming a dragon. As a action, you gain the following benefits for 10 minutes:
- You again a bonus to Strength, Constitution and Dexterity saving throws equal to your Dragon Slayer Rank.
- Dragon wings appear on your back, giving you a flying speed of 40 feet.
- You have resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison and thunder damage.

hp.special: 6 + six times your level (the drake has a number of hit dice [d12s] equal to your level)

trait.name: Battle Training
entries: In combat, the drake shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn before yours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drake makes a number of attacks equal to half your proficiency bonus (rounded down).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 + PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + PB} piercing damage.

_.displayName: a riding saddle for your drake

items.name: Skill Proficiencies
items.entry: {@skill Animal Handling}, plus one from among {@skill Survival} and {@skill History}

items.name: Languages
items.entry: {@language Draconic}, plus one of your choice

items.name: Tool Proficiencies
items.entry: {@filter Vehicles (land)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=Vehicle (land)}, plus one from among {@item Cartographer's tools|phb}, {@item Herbalism kit|phb} and {@item Navigator's tools|phb}

items.name: Equipment
items.entry: One set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, a {@item riding saddle|phb| riding saddle for yor drake}, a family book about drakes, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 15 gp

entries.name: Feature: Dragon Rider
entries: Your family practis dragon riding for generation. Every family member shares a magical bond with a minor dragon from the moment of birth. Those drakes are a part of your family, helping each other in everyday work. You have a {@creature Drake Companion|GodHunt} which accompanies you on your adventures. In dire need you can return to your hometown to obtain help for your drake companion ore knowledge about dragons.

item.name: Heaven's Keeper
entries: You have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

entries.name: Far Watcher
entries: This bow attack range is doubled.

item.name: Yang
entries: You gain a +3 bonus to spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs.

entries.name: Unbalance
entries: A creature that is not attuned to {@item Yin|GodHunt} takes 2d6 radiant damage upon touching the weapon. A creature takes damage each time it ends its turn holding or carrying the weapon.

entries.name: Ethereal Weapon (1 psi)
entries: As a attack , you temporarily transform the weapon into pure psionic energy. You make an attack that ignores the target's armor, requiring. The target makes a Dexterity saving throw against your’s attack roll. On a failed save, the attack hits, on a successful save, the attack misses.

entries.name: Mystical Protection (3 psi)
entries: When you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, you can use your reaction to gain resistance to damage of that type including the triggering damage until the end of your next turn

item.name: Yin
entries: You have a +3 bonus to all weapon attack rolls.

entries.name: Unbalance
entries: A creature that is not attuned to {@item Yang|GodHunt} takes 2d6 necrotic damage upon touching the weapon. A creature takes  damage each time it ends its turn holding or carrying the weapon.

entries.name: Tartarean Weapon (1 psi)
entries: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you imbue it with psionic energy. The creature must make a Wisdom saving throw taking 1d12 psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Rend Protection (3 psi)
entries: When a creature's resistance reduces the damage you deal, you can cause that damage to ignore the creature's resistance.

entries.name: Versatile Cut
entries: This item takes the form of any piece of clothing the person attuned to it wants to.

entries.name: Man-shape
entries: If the creature attuned to this magic item isn't classified as humanoid it can use its action to metamorph into a humanoid form which is determined by user. The creature loses any features of its natural form.

item.name: Crimson Cursed Glaive
entries: You have a +1/+2/+3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

entries.name: Deathbringer
entries: When you damage a creature with an attack using this magic weapon, the target can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Bloodseeker
entries: Whenever you reduce a creature to 0 hit points using this weapon, you gain 1d8/2d6/12 temporary hit points.

entries.name: Lifesbane
entries: The axe deals an extra 1d4/1d6/1d8 necrotic damage to creatures that aren't constructs or undead.

item.name: Deathveil
item.reqAttune: by a pact of the blade warlock
entries: You have a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Pact Armor
entries: You can use your action to summon this pact armour on or off your body. You are proficient with it while you wear it.

Your pact armour disappears if it is more than 15 feet away from you for 1 minute or more. It also disappears if you dismiss the armour (no action required). If you die or break attunement, the armour appears at your feet.

entries.name: Hex Defence
entries: The magic you channel helps ward off any attacks. While you maintain concentration on a spell, you have a +2 bonus to AC.

entries.name: Eldritch Grace
entries: Your patron's magic bolsters you, to spread it will. Gain a bonus to all saving throw equal to your Charisma modifier (with a minimum bonus of +1).
You can't benefit from this ability and aura of protection feature at the same time.

entries.name: Demon Wings
entries: While you wear the armor demonic wings appear on your back, you have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. You can use the wings to fly for up to 4 hours, all at once or in several shorter flights, each one using a minimum of 1 minute from the duration. If you are flying when the duration expires, you descend at a rate of 30 feet per round until you land.

spell.name: Augment Obsidian
entries: You infuse a melee weapon you touch with a outer layer of sharp and brittle obsidian shards.
For the duration, the weapon requires at least 15 Strength to wield without disadvantage.
Attacks with the weapon deal an additional damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.
Each time the affected weapon hits with an attack, bits of obsidian break away, after 4 hits the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2th level or higher, the number of hits increases by 1 for every level above 1st.
